sentence.Network_en: Only the Basques resisted the conquering Aryan speech.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有巴斯克语抵制住了雅利安语的征服.

sentence.Network_en: The Bulgarians also are a Turkish people, but they have acquired an Aryan speech.
sentence.Network_cn: 保加利亚人也是一个土耳其民族, 不过他们学到的是雅利安语.

sentence.Network_en: They all spoke variants of what once must have been the same language, Aryan.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们说的全是同一种语言的不同变体,以前肯定都属于印欧语系语言.
